alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:47AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Highlands, Hardee, northeastern Manatee, Polk and east central Hillsborough Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 547 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Haines City to 6 miles southeast of Bartow to 8 miles northeast of Myakka City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Sebring, Avon Park, Wauchula, Lake Istokpoga, Medulla, Ona, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Sebring Regional Airport, Lakeland Linder Airport, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Sweetwater, and Fort Meade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central, south central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Polk
